metadata.title: CVE-2017-15864 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Agent Frontend in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 3.3.x through3.3.18, with a crafted URL it is possible to gain information like databaseuser and password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15864` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.5-1
otrs2 - 6.0.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.5-1').
